name: GKChallengeEventHandlerDelegate
desc: You implement the GKChallengeEventHandlerDelegate delegate to control how challenges are displayed in your game.

items.name: func localPlayerDidSelect(GKChallenge!)
items.desc: Called when the local player selects a challenge banner displayed by GameKit.

items.name: func localPlayerDidReceive(GKChallenge!)
items.desc: Called when the local player receives a new challenge.

items.name: func shouldShowBanner(forLocallyReceivedChallenge: GKChallenge!) -> Bool
items.desc: Called to determine whether a banner should be shown when the local player receives a challenge.

items.name: func localPlayerDidComplete(GKChallenge!)
items.desc: Called when the local player completes a challenge.

items.name: func shouldShowBanner(forLocallyCompletedChallenge: GKChallenge!) -> Bool
items.desc: Called to determine whether a banner should be shown when the local player completes a challenge.

items.name: func remotePlayerDidComplete(GKChallenge!)
items.desc: Called when a remote player completes a challenge issued by the local player.

items.name: func shouldShowBanner(forRemotelyCompletedChallenge: GKChallenge!) -> Bool
items.desc: Called to determine whether a banner should be shown when a remote player completes a challenge.
